articles.title: DPRK Permanent Mission at UN Sends Notice to U.S. Department of State
articles.content:
DPRK Permanent Mission at UN Sends Notice to U.S. Department of State
 Pyongyang, June 25 (KCNA) -- As regards the DPRK's recent successful test-fire of surface-to-surface medium long-range strategic ballistic rocket Hwasong-10, the U.S. Department of State on June 23 informed the former of its stand that the former's strategic ballistic rocket test-fire was a wanton "violation" of the resolutions of the UNSC, escalated the tension on the Korean peninsula and created instability in the region and, therefore, the former should refrain from any further provocation and threat. 
					 Lurking behind this is a U.S. sinister intention to cover up its criminal act of rendering the situation on the peninsula extremely tense, pass the buck for the increasing tension on the peninsula to the DPRK and, at the same time, ratchet up the atmosphere of international pressure upon it, while persistently resorting to war drills and arms buildup on the peninsula and in its vicinity.
					
					 In this connection the DPRK permanent mission at the UN sent a reply notice to the U.S. Department of State on June 24 clarifying the DPRK's principled stand.  
					
					 The notice expressed the DPRK's stand that the "resolutions" of the UNSC which ban the former's rocket launch is a breach of the UN Charter and international laws and a series of steps taken by Pyongyang to bolster up its nuclear deterrent to cope with the undisguised nuclear threat which the U.S. is posing to it by ceaselessly introducing strategic assets into south Korea and its vicinity cannot be regarded as provocations as they are the DPRK's just measures for self-defence. 
					
					 It emphasized it is the stand of the DPRK that it should have in place powerful attack means which can pose a constant threat to the U.S. in order to firmly protect the security of the country and the people from the U.S. persistent nuclear threat. 
					
					 The notice also stressed the DPRK's principled stand that as the U.S. hostile acts against the DPRK have become "routine", the latter's work for implementing the line of simultaneously developing the two fronts to cope with those acts has been put on a routine basis and it would continue taking steps for bolstering up its nuclear deterrent for self-defence one after another, consistently holding fast to the line of simultaneously developing the two fronts as long as the U.S. hostile policy and nuclear threat persist.

articles.title: DPRK NDC Policy Department Blasts U.S., S. Korea for Turning Southwestern Waters in West Sea into Hottest Spot Waters
articles.content:
DPRK NDC Policy Department Blasts U.S., S. Korea for Turning Southwestern Waters in West Sea into Hottest Spot Waters
 Pyongyang, June 25 (KCNA) -- The Policy Department of the National Defence Commission (NDC) of the DPRK in a detailed report on Saturday disclosed and denounced the thrice-cursed crimes committed by the sworn enemy given the prevailing situation in the hot spot waters in the West Sea which can be called the epitome of the U.S. hostile policy toward the DPRK and the south Korean puppet forces' policy for confrontation with the DPRK.
					 The report disclosed the sinister nature of the gangster-like U.S. which turned the West Sea of Korea into the hottest spot waters.
					
					 The military tension in these waters that does not subside despite the passage of time is the extension of the U.S. hostile policy toward the DPRK and its direct product, the report said, and went on:
					
					 Back in 1953 when the June 25 war ended in truce, the U.S. moved desperately to create a starting point for a new war.
					
					 On many occasions such as the 346th meeting of the Military Armistice Committee in December 1973, the DPRK-U.S. general-level talks in Panmunjom in August and September 1999, the U.S. categorically ignored the efforts made by the DPRK side to set the maritime military demarcation line in the West Sea and prevent the military conflict there.
					
					 The U.S. has been without exception behind the vicious moves of the puppet forces of south Korea to escalate the military tension in the hot spot waters in the West Sea into the estuary of the River Han.
					
					 Lots of artillery live-shell firing drills in the said waters and the ceaseless intrusion into the territorial waters and air of the DPRK after the fabrication of the "northern limit line" in the West Sea of Korea clearly prove that the U.S. is the arch criminal ratcheting military tension and the danger of conflict in these waters.
					
					 The report also disclosed the moves of the south Korean puppet forces, a group of hideous warmongers who turned the sea common to the nation into the hot spot waters of confrontation and conflict. It continued:
					
					 The puppet Command for the Defense of Northwestern Islands of south Korea which regards the hot spot waters in the West Sea as its operational theatre held a "memorial service" for those who met deaths while running riot in the forefront areas for confrontation with the fellow countrymen and also has been hell-bent on another round of provocation while crying out for "punishment".
					
					 This was timed to coincide with the farce for taking a posture for putting an end to the "north's provocation" within 24 hours by task forces of the puppet navy and marine corps commissioned in May.
					
					 From 16th to 18th, dozens of large combat warships of the puppet navy and coastal police staged marine mobile drills with fighters with different missions involved. They also staged air defence drill, exercises for defending the area they are stationed and exercises for countering underwater infiltration while crying out for turning the hot spot waters into the "grave" of someone and escalating military stand-off for the purpose.
					
					  In fact, the military situation in the hot spot waters in the West Sea has gone beyond the phase of control.
					
					 A clear proof of it was the reckless military actions committed by the puppet military gangsters on May 27.
					
					 The provocative marine infiltration is without exception supported by the puppet air force and ground artillery pieces with the involvement of the fully-armed marine groups made up of puppet warships.
					
					 The sinister aim sought by the south Korean puppet forces is to deliberately invade the inviolable territorial waters of the DPRK and make a preemptive strike and thus compel the Korean People's Army to take counteraction for self-defence and then paint the DPRK as the chieftain of "provocation" and "threat" by setting in motion reptile reactionary media and push the situation in the hot spot waters in the West Sea to the brink of war.
					
					 The most urgent task for ensuring peace and security on the Korean peninsula at present is to put the situation in the hot spot waters in the West Sea under control, the report said, and noted:
					
					 The increasing military tension has to be deescalated and the daily mounting danger of military conflict has to be defused at an early date.
					
					 Traitor Park Geun Hye and her group finding themselves at risk in the face of the worst "administrative" crisis are pushing the situation in the sensitive hot spot waters in the West Sea to the point of explosion at the zealous instigation of their American master.
					
					 The hot spot waters in the West Sea made us keenly realize in practice the truth that talking would never help achieve peace and only matchlessly powerful arms will ensure genuine peace.
					
					 Steadfast is the will of the army and people of the DPRK to prevent the danger of conflict in the hot spot waters in the West Sea, improve the north-south relations and defuse tension on the Korean peninsula.
					
					 The U.S. and the south Korean puppet forces should admit their criminal responsibility for turning the southwestern waters into the world's hottest spot waters and immediately stop their reckless military provocations.

articles.title: DPRK Red Cross Society Demands S. Korean Regime Unconditionally Send back Its Citizens
articles.content:
DPRK Red Cross Society Demands S. Korean Regime Unconditionally Send back Its Citizens
 Pyongyang, June 25 (KCNA) -- The south Korean puppet authorities on June 21 declined the request for the presence of the citizens of the DPRK whom they lured and abducted to south Korea at a trial claimed by the Bar Association for Democratic Society, and sent a legal representative who is their cat's paw there, thereby bringing the trial to a rupture. This only glaringly revealed their true colors as a group of human rights abusers and matchless philistines.
					 A spokesman for the Central Committee of the Red Cross Society of the DPRK said in a statement on June 25 that the above-said behavior of the south Korean authorities was little short of self-admittance to the hideous allurement and abduction committed by themselves as it shows how much they are afraid of the disclosure of their criminal nature.
					
					 The puppet group can have neither reason nor excuse whatsoever to decline the request made by the Association which was authorized by the families of victims, the statement said, and went on:
					
					 The gangsters of the puppet Intelligence Service are the criminals who are resorting to all sorts of plot-breeding and conspiracy to divide harmonious families of the people in the DPRK while getting engrossed in the abduction of the DPRK citizens in order to save their hideous hostile policy toward the DPRK from its bankruptcy and the abductees of the DPRK and their families are their direct victims.
					
					 Even at this moment, the families of victims are holding out the hope that their beloved daughters would come back to the fold of the families as early as possible, and we are ready to immediately send them to south Korea to meet their daughters.
					
					 Now the puppet group is talking about "adaptation" and "brain-washing." This is just poor sleight of hand to keep the abductees away from outside, cover up the despicable true nature of their unethical crimes and escape protest and denunciation at home and abroad.
					
					 Frankly speaking, we know well through reliable information obtained from the inside source of the puppet group the reason why it is not letting public know about the condition of the DPRK citizens and in what difficult situation they brave blackmail and appeasement.
					
					 We also know that the gangsters of the puppet Intelligence Service are now finding themselves in hot water over the issue of how to handle the citizens of the DPRK.
					
					 Those telling more lies to cover up truth would become bigger liars and they are bound to add crimes to what they have committed already amid public censure.
					
					 If the puppet group persistently resorts to sordid smear campaign against the citizens of the DPRK and keeps mocking at the public at home and abroad, rubbing salt in the wounds of the families of the victims, the situation will turn out to be more serious. This is our repeated warning.

articles.title: Day of Strategic Force Instituted in DPRK
articles.content:
Day of Strategic Force Instituted in DPRK
 Pyongyang, June 25 (KCNA) -- A decree of the Presidium of the Supreme People's Assembly of the DPRK on instituting the Day of Strategic Force of the DPRK was promulgated on Friday.
					 The decree said that the Strategic Force of the heroic Korean People's Army (KPA) is a reliable nuclear force of the Workers' Party of Korea that has deterred and foiled the U.S. imperialists and other hostile forces' ever more undisguised for igniting a nuclear war and can creditably guarantee the eternal future of the country and the nation.
					
					 It noted that leader Kim Jong Il, who successfully carried forward and developed President Kim Il Sung's idea on building the Juche-based rocket force long ago, founded the Strategic Rocket Force, an independent service, on July 3, 1999 to lay a solid foundation for bolstering the nuclear deterrent for self-defence.
					
					 It said that true to the noble intention of the great leaders, Marshal Kim Jong Un clarified the Juche-based striking methods of the Strategic Force of the KPA in view of the prevailing situation and as required by modern warfare, and developed it into a powerful service equipped with miniaturized and high-precision nuclear strike means with his energetic guidance.
					
					 Under the care of the peerlessly great men of Mt. Paektu the Strategic Force of the KPA has turned into a force strong in ideology and faith that fully established the party's unitary command system and into invincible militant ranks capable of blowing up at a stroke any bases of aggression on the earth, the decree said.
					
					 It noted that to significantly mark July 3, 1999 when Kim Jong Il organized the Strategic Force of the KPA, the DPRK decided to set the day as the Day of the Strategic Force.

articles.title: DPRK Officials and Norwegian Ambassador Exchange Views on Situation on Korean Peninsula
articles.content:
DPRK Officials and Norwegian Ambassador Exchange Views on Situation on Korean Peninsula
 Pyongyang, June 25 (KCNA) -- Norwegian Ambassador to the DPRK Jan Ole Grevstad presented his credentials to Kim Yong Nam, president of the Presidium of the Supreme People's Assembly of the DPRK. 
					 The ambassador met with officials concerned including a vice minister of Foreign Affairs and the ambassador for human rights from June 20 to 24.
					
					 Both sides discussed the issue of developing the bilateral relations in the common interests of the peoples of the two countries and had an in-depth exchange of views on the present situation on the Korean peninsula.
					
					 The DPRK side said that to defuse tension and preserve stability cannot be realized only by the unilateral efforts of the DPRK as the root cause of escalating tensions on the peninsula is attributable to the U.S. hostile policy toward the DPRK and nuclear threat to it. 
					
					 The DPRK side also said that the U.S. reckless act of ceaselessly introducing its strategic assets into the Korean peninsula and its vicinity is compelling the DPRK to take new stronger steps for bolstering its nuclear deterrence both in quality and quantity.
					
					 It stressed that the U.S. will bitterly feel that its recent introduction of strategic assets such as nuclear-powered submarine Mississippi into the peninsula is a very rash act and strategically wrong decision.
					
					 The Norwegian side expressed hope to see distrust between the DPRK and the U.S. defused and the nuclear issue settled.

articles.title: Kim Yong Nam Meets Special Envoy of Namibian President
articles.content:
Kim Yong Nam Meets Special Envoy of Namibian President 
 Pyongyang, June 25 (KCNA) -- Kim Yong Nam, president of the Presidium of the Supreme People's Assembly of the DPRK, met and had a talk with Deputy Prime Minister and Minister of International Relations and Cooperation of Namibia Netumbo NandiÔºçNdaitwah who is a special envoy of the Namibian president and her party who paid a courtesy call on him at the Mansudae Assembly Hall Saturday.

articles.title: Talks Held between DPRK Foreign Minister and Special Envoy of Namibian President
articles.content:
Talks Held between DPRK Foreign Minister and Special Envoy of Namibian President
 Pyongyang, June 25 (KCNA) -- There were talks between Ri Yong Ho, foreign minister of the DPRK, and Netumbo Nandi-Ndaitwah, deputy prime minister and minister of International Relations and Cooperation of Namibia who is a special envoy of the Namibian president, at the Mansudae Assembly Hall Saturday.
					 Present there were officials concerned from the DPRK side and the party of the special envoy including Selma Ashipala Musavyi, permanent secretary of the Ministry of International Relations and Cooperation from the opposite side.
					
					 At the talks both sides exchanged views on the issue of invariably developing the friendly and cooperative relations between the two countries and a series of other issues of mutual concern.
					
					 The DPRK foreign minister said that the army and people of the DPRK elected supreme leader Kim Jong Un as chairman of the Workers' Party of Korea at its Seventh Congress and have turned out as one in the drive for carrying out the decision made at the Seventh Congress of the WPK and for building a socialist power, and referred to the policy and stand of the WPK on the cause of global independence and to the friendly and cooperative relations between the two countries.
					
					 The special envoy said that the DPRK was one of the countries that forged diplomatic relations soon after Namibia won independence, adding that the two countries have historically maintained traditional relations of friendship and cooperation and that Namibia would further develop these relations no matter how the international situation may change in the future.
					
					 The special envoy warmly congratulated Kim Jong Un on his election as chairman of the WPK and hoped that the Korean people would thoroughly carry out the tasks set forth at the Seventh Congress of the WPK and thus push forward the building of a socialist power and register greater success in the efforts to achieve the independent reunification of the country.
					
					 The talks proceeded in a friendly atmosphere.

articles.title: Kim Yong Nam Greets President of Mozambique
articles.content:
Kim Yong Nam Greets President of Mozambique
 Pyongyang, June 25 (KCNA) -- Kim Yong Nam, president of the Presidium of the Supreme People's Assembly of the DPRK, sent a message of greeting to Filipe Jacinto Nwussi, president of the Republic of Mozambique, on Saturday on the occasion of its national day.
					 The message expressed belief that the friendly and cooperative relations between the two countries with a long history and tradition would grow stronger in all fields including politics, economy and culture, sincerely wishing the president good health and happiness and greater success in his responsible work for the development and prosperity of the country.

articles.title: Kim Yong Nam Greets Croatian President
articles.content:
Kim Yong Nam Greets Croatian President
 Pyongyang, June 25 (KCNA) -- Kim Yong Nam, president of the Presidium of the Supreme People's Assembly of the DPRK, Saturday sent a message of greeting to Kolinda Grabar Kitarovic, president of the Republic of Croatia, on the occasion of its national day.
					 The message sincerely wished the president success in her work for the development and prosperity of the country.

articles.title: Ri Yong Ho Greets FM of Slovenia
articles.content:
Ri Yong Ho Greets FM of Slovenia
 Pyongyang, June 25 (KCNA) -- DPRK Foreign Minister Ri Yong Ho Saturday sent a message of greeting to Karl Erjavec, deputy prime minister and minister of Foreign Affairs of Slovenia, on the occasion of its national day.
					 The message expressed belief that the friendly and cooperative relations between the two countries would grow stronger in the common interests.

articles.title: Pyongyangites Meet to Observe Day of Struggle against U.S. Imperialism
articles.content:
Pyongyangites Meet to Observe Day of Struggle against U.S. Imperialism
 Pyongyang, June 25 (KCNA) -- A meeting of Pyongyangites took place at Kim Il Sung Square Saturday to mark June 25, the day of struggle against U.S. imperialism.
					 Present there were Pak Pong Ju, Choe Ryong Hae, Kim Ki Nam and other senior party and state officials, the chairperson of a friendly party, officials of working people's organizations, ministries and national institutions, officials of ministries, national institutions, industrial establishments, co-op farms and universities in the city, working people, youth and students, overseas Koreans and the chief of the Pyongyang mission of the Anti-Imperialist National Democratic Front.
					
					 Present there on invitation were diplomatic envoys and staff members of foreign embassies and members of the military attaches corps here and foreign guests.
					
					 Cha Hui Rim, chairman of the Pyongyang City People's Committee, in his address said that more than six decades have passed since a war ended on this land but the U.S. imperialists have persisted in their moves to stifle it by illegally keeping south Korea under its occupation, far from drawing a due lesson from their disgraceful defeat in the Korean war.
					
					 He condemned the U.S. imperialists for getting frantic in their moves to ignite a nuclear war after introducing huge forces and war hardware into south Korea in the wake of their outrageous hostile acts of fabricating the unprecedented UN "resolutions on sanctions" against the DPRK this year alone over its steps for bolstering up nuclear deterrence, choice for self-defense, and its just and legitimate satellite launches.
					
					 They went the lengths of perpetrating such hideous provocation as examining the flexibility of their hideous "beheading operation" aimed to bring down the headquarters of the Korean revolution and "social system" of the DPRK, he said, adding:
					
					 Such reckless provocations made by the U.S. imperialists and the south Korean puppet forces to escalate the confrontation with the DPRK in utter disregard of the changed situation and the trend of the times are hardening the will of the service personnel and people of the DPRK to take a thousand-fold revenge upon the enemy.
					
					 The speaker underlined the need to turn the stronghold of the enemy into sea in flames and thus root out the source of war and certainly achieve the historic cause of national reunification if the U.S. imperialists and the puppet group of traitors encroach upon the dignity and sovereignty of the DPRK even a bit despite its repeated warnings.
					
					 Representatives of workers, agricultural workers and youth and students in their speeches renewed their resolution to blow up the bulwark of aggression with matchless arms of Paektusan by carrying forward the tradition of great victory and bring the most miserable end to the aggressors so that there would be no one left to sign a surrender document and thus bring another July 27 of the final victory without fail.
					
					 Then followed a mass demonstration.
					
					 Similar meetings took place in all provinces, cities and counties.

articles.title: DPRK Social Organizations Hold Anti-U.S. Meeting, Photo Exhibition
articles.content:
DPRK Social Organizations Hold Anti-U.S. Meeting, Photo Exhibition
 Pyongyang, June 25 (KCNA) -- Social organizations of the DPRK held an anti-U.S. meeting and a photo exhibition disclosing the criminal acts of the U.S. forces at the Chollima House of Culture on Saturday on the occasion of the June 25-July 27 month of anti-U.S. joint struggle.
					 Present there were leading officials and members of various organizations including the National Peace Committee of Korea, Korean Committee for Solidarity with the World People, Afro-Asian Solidarity Committee of Korea, Democratic Lawyers Association of Korea and the Korean Anti-War Peace Physicians, Pyongyangites and honorary guests.
					
					 At the anti-U.S. meeting, Kim Jong Suk, chairwoman of the National Peace Committee of Korea, read out an open letter the participants in the joint conference of the DPRK government, political parties and organizations sent to the United States of America on June 10. Then followed speeches.
					
					 The speakers denounced the U.S. as the sworn enemy who has perpetrated aggression and plunder of Korea since its aggressor ship General Sherman's invasion and as the arch criminal who has brought misfortune and pain to the Korean people century after century.
					
					 The U.S. which had imposed a fratricidal war upon the Korean people 66 years ago has still stepped up its hostile policy toward the DPRK, they noted, adding that this is touching off towering anti-Americanism and resentment among the service personnel and people of the DPRK.
					
					 They called upon the justice- and peace-loving progressives of the world, international democratic organizations and peace-loving people to extend full support and solidarity to the just struggle of the Korean people to replace the Armistice Agreement by a peace treaty, drive the U.S. forces out of south Korea as early as possible and achieve peace and stability on the Korean peninsula and in Northeast Asia during the month of anti-U.S. joint struggle.
					
					 At the end of the meeting, the participants looked round photos showing massacres and other crimes the U.S. forces committed during the Korean war and in south Korea after the war.

articles.title: Central Bank Delegation Leaves for Russia
articles.content:
Central Bank Delegation Leaves for Russia
 Pyongyang, June 25 (KCNA) -- A delegation of the Central Bank led by President Kim Chon Gyun left here Saturday to take part in the 25th International Bank Congress to be held in Sankt-Peterburg of Russia.

articles.title: Delegation of DPRK Red Cross Society Leaves for Macao of China and Malaysia
articles.content:
Delegation of DPRK Red Cross Society Leaves for Macao of China and Malaysia
 Pyongyang, June 25 (KCNA) -- A delegation of the DPRK Red Cross Society led by Executive Vice-Chairman Paek Yong Ho left here Saturday to visit Macao of China and Malaysia.

articles.title: Carcass Work Hastened in Construction of Ryomyong Street
articles.content:
Carcass Work Hastened in Construction of Ryomyong Street
 Pyongyang, June 25 (KCNA) -- A brisk campaign for creating the Mallima Speed is going on in Ryomyong Street under construction in Pyongyang.
					 As of June 20, the carcass work of scores of apartment buildings with over 3 000 flats was finished only 78 days after the start of the construction.
					
					 Builders completed the frame-working of 33-storied apartment building with 116 flats and 35-storied one with 135 flats on June 19 and 40-storied and 10-storied buildings with 148 flats and 150 flats on June 20 respectively.
					
					 And, the frame-working of 70- and 55-storied skyscrapers and high rises are carrying on above 30th or 40th stories.
					
					 Meanwhile, over 340 000 square meters of plastering were carried out with 5 500 cubic meters of brick-laying.
					
					 Soldier-builders are performing such great feats as completing the carcass work of one story in every 14 hours.

articles.title: New Stamps Issued in DPRK
articles.content:
New Stamps Issued in DPRK
 Pyongyang, June 25 (KCNA) -- The State Stamp Bureau of the DPRK issued two new kinds of individual stamps on the occasion of the June 25-July 27 month of anti-U.S. joint struggle.
					 Written on the upper parts of the stamps are letters "The June 25-July 27 month of anti-U.S. joint struggle".
					
					 One of the stamps deals with the poster "Don't forget, the U.S. imperialist wolves!" condemning the horrible massacres committed by the U.S. imperialists on the land of Korea during the Korean war and calling for a thousand-fold revenge upon them.
					
					 Another stamp which deals with the poster "Wipe out the U.S. imperialist aggressors, the sworn enemy of the Korean people!" reflects the mettle of the service personnel of the People's Army to wipe out the aggressors to the last one so that there would be no one left to sign a document of surrender once Supreme Commander Kim Jong Un issues an order and accomplish the historic cause of national reunification without fail.

articles.title: Schoolchildren Enjoy at Remodeled Camp in Pyongyang
articles.content:
Schoolchildren Enjoy at Remodeled Camp in Pyongyang
 Pyongyang, June 25 (KCNA) -- Many schoolchildren are now enjoying themselves at the recently renovated Mangyongdae Children's Camp in Pyongyang, the capital city of the DPRK.
					 Their happy looks and laughter can be seen or heard in everywhere of the camp, including hotels, outdoor swimming pool and archery course and cultural hall.
					
					 The camp, located at the foot of scenic Mt. Ryongak known as Mt. Kumgang in Pyongyang, tells about the great love shown by the peerlessly great persons for children.
					
					 In April Juche 63 (1974), President Kim Il Sung toured Mt. Ryongak and recommended building a children's camp and a pleasure ground there. And he gave a detailed instruction for the construction of a camp, personally choosing a mountain-climbing route for campers.
					
					 When the camp was completed in April 1979, the President visited it, teaching in detail about its operation.
					
					 Leader Kim Jong Il personally fixed the camp's name and birthday and saw to it that necessary goods were supplied on a top priority basis to the camp even in the period of Arduous March, the forced march, when the country was pressed hard for everything.
					
					 Several hundred pieces of gifts at the camp evidently show the great leaders' paternal love for the rising generations.
					
					 Supreme leader Kim Jong Un examined a layout for renovation of the camp and guided its reconstruction to turn it into a splendid palace for children.

articles.title: Truth about Korean War Provoked by U.S. under Cloak of UN
articles.content:
Truth about Korean War Provoked by U.S. under Cloak of UN
 Pyongyang, June 25 (KCNA) -- It has been 66 years since the U.S. imperialists unleashed the 1950-1953 Korean War by instigating the puppet Syngman Rhee clique of south Korea.
					 The Korean War was an unusual showdown between the allied forces headed by the U.S. and a young country.
					
					 Before provoking the war, the U.S. had schemed to "legitimate" its overall armed invasion by abusing the name of the United Nations.
					
					 Its prearranged scenario suggested that the forces of south Korea had to attack the DPRK because the latter's army "invaded" the former and then the U.S. presented a case to the UN for feeding the U.S. troops and its allied forces into the Korean War when it broke out.
					
					 In order to carry this scenario into practice, the U.S. let its State Department work out in advance documents and resolutions to be presented and adopted at the UN General Assembly and the UNSC.
					
					 Under such preparations, the U.S. imperialists ignited a war against the DPRK on June 25, 1950. And they railroaded through the UNSC "resolutions" aimed to shift the blame for the outbreak of the Korean War on to the DPRK and allow armed intervention in Korea.
					
					 On July 7 that year, the U.S. egged Britain and France to submit another resolution which stipulated that its military action would be conducted under the UN flag and the troops of its allies would be under its command.
					
					 Consequently, MacArthur, commander of the U.S. forces in the Far East, was appointed as "commander of the UN forces" and the command of the U.S. forces in the Far East turned into the "UN Command" and the troops of the U.S. and its satellite nations could take part in the war under the helmet of "UN forces".
					
					 As seen above, the U.S. imperialists embellished the Korean War as "defensive war" done by the UN for its mission.
					
					 However, the truth of history can be concealed with nothing.
					
					 The U.S. can never evade the blame for the Korean War it provoked even by abusing the name of the UN.

articles.title: U.S. Imperialists' Provocation of Another War Would Bring Them to Final Ruin: Rodong Sinmun
articles.content:
U.S. Imperialists' Provocation of Another War Would Bring Them to Final Ruin: Rodong Sinmun 
 Pyongyang, June 25 (KCNA) -- The service personnel and people of the DPRK will always remember June 25, 1950 when the U.S. imperialists ignited the Korean war no matter how much water may flow under the bridge, says Rodong Sinmun Saturday in a commentary.
					 The U.S. imperialists fought the 3-year war while committing mass killing and destruction by mobilizing huge forces of their satellite countries and all modern war means but they sustained a defeat in face of the army and people of the DPRK, the commentary notes, and goes on:
					
					 They made desperate efforts to write off the proud history of war victory won by the DPRK and realize their wild ambition for world domination at any cost, oblivious of their disgraceful defeat in the Korean war and the experience drawn from the total failure in their hostile policy toward the DPRK, but they turned out to be a daydream.
					
					 Not only the appearance of the DPRK but also its position has changed. It emerged a nuclear power having access to even H-bomb. The defense science field of the DPRK recently succeeded in the test-fire of surface-to-surface medium long-range strategic ballistic rocket Hwasong-10, once again fully displaying its powerful capability for mounting a preemptive nuclear attack capable of posing a constant threat to the enemies.
					
					 If the U.S. imperialists ignite another Korean war, this will bring them a final ruin.
					
					 Should the U.S. imperialists ignite a nuclear war, failing to draw a lesson from their defeat in the past, the DPRK will let them clearly know what dear price they will have to pay for it.
					
					 It is the steadfast will of the service personnel and people of the DPRK to wipe out the aggressors to the last one so that there would be no one left to sign a document of  surrender and bring final ruin to the U.S. imperialists and the south Korean puppet forces.

articles.title: S. Korean Regime Accused of Making Humiliating "Agreement" with Japan
articles.content:
S. Korean Regime Accused of Making Humiliating "Agreement" with Japan
 Pyongyang, June 25 (KCNA) -- The Council for the Solution of the Issue of the Volunteers Corps in south Korea denounced the puppet regime's submission to Japan on Tuesday, according to the south Korean internet paper Voice of People.
					 The council accused the regime of concluding an "agreement" with Japan on the issue of sexual slavery for the Imperial Japanese Army in disregard of its victims.
					
					 The council said it would not receive hypocritical "aid funds" from the regime in token of protest.
					
					 It noted it would carry on the action together with citizens until the regime properly opts for the solution to the issue of sexual slavery.

articles.title: Opposition Parties in S. Korea Criticize Ruling Conservatives for Heated Power Scramble
articles.content:
Opposition Parties in S. Korea Criticize Ruling Conservatives for Heated Power Scramble
 Pyongyang, June 25 (KCNA) -- Opposition parties of south Korea criticized the ruling conservative forces for their heated scramble for power.
					 A parliamentary spokesman for the Minju Party in a commentary on June 18 blamed the ruling party for wasting time with a partisan strife in disregard of people, adding such strife only causes losses to the people.
					
					 A parliamentary spokesman for the Party of People in a commentary on the same day accused the ruling party of the conflict festering between pro-Park and anti-Park groups within the party.
					
					 This is an act of treachery against the people, he claimed, urging the ruling "Saenuri party" to pay attention to the people's interests rather than considering the feelings of the "president."

articles.title: Hand-Foot-Mouth Disease Spreads in S. Korea
articles.content:
Hand-Foot-Mouth Disease Spreads in S. Korea
 Pyongyang, June 25 (KCNA) -- Epidemic hand-foot-mouth is rapidly spreading across south Korea, according to MBC of south Korea.
					 The number of the cases increased 40 percent last week as compared with that two weeks before.
					
					 The number of cases this year has reached an all time high since 2010.

articles.title: S. Korean Organization Warns Authorities Not to Commit Any More Crimes
articles.content:
S. Korean Organization Warns Authorities Not to Commit Any More Crimes
Pyongyang, June 25 (KCNA) -- The Headquarters of the People's Movement for the Reform of Private Schools and Liquidation of Scandals on June 23 released a statement urging the Park Geun Hye regime not to commit any more crimes in history before the expiry of the tenure of office.
					 The statement accused the regime of paying no attention to the people's living, locked in scramble for power.
					
					 It went on:
					
					 That's why the present regime was punished in the recent general election.
					
					 If the "government" has a shred of conscience, it should reflect on its crimes committed so far and stop perpetrating any more crimes in the remainder of its tenure of office.

articles.title: Central Committee of GFTUK Accuses S. Korean Regime of Abusing Workers' Right to Existence
articles.content:
Central Committee of GFTUK Accuses S. Korean Regime of Abusing Workers' Right to Existence
 Pyongyang, June 25 (KCNA) -- Recently, the Park Geun Hye regime of south Korea is pushing ahead with the introduction of the system of paying salaries according to piece rate. Workers and other people of various circles in south Korea are staging broad-based actions against it.
					 On June 18 the south Korean Confederation of Trade Unions and the Federation of Trade Unions of south Korea sponsored a meeting of 100 000 financial and public workers for pledging an all-out action in Seoul. There, they strongly denounced the regime for working hard to reduce the workers to slaves of money and power and pass the buck for its failed economic policy and the deteriorated people's living to them by introducing the above-said system. They launched a large-scale anti-"government" action under the slogan "Let's put an end to the oppressive and dictatorial regime!"
					
					 They had already staged a series of actions including a meeting for pledging a protest against the regime, group hair cutting and meetings of workers of trade unions of various industrial sectors.
					
					 They declared at the meeting that they would go on a general strike of 400 000 workers in case Chief Executive Park Geun Hye fails to retract the above-said introduction plan.
					
					 The Central Committee of the General Federation of Trade Unions of Korea said in a statement on Saturday:
					
					 The south Korean workers' actions are an eruption of the pent-up curse and anger of south Koreans of various circles at traitor Park and their stern punishment of her who has mercilessly abused even the elementary right to existence of the popular masses, not content with turning south Korea into a veritable hell through outrageous fascist dictatorship and unpopular rule.
					
					 The above-said system which Park is working with bloodshot eyes to introduce is, in fact, the most inhumane and unpopular modern-day slavery system that legalizes and justifies the harsh exploitation and maltreatment of workers. This is clear evidence proving Park-style twisted "outlook on economy and value."
					
					 By origin, Park is a thrice-cursed enemy with whom the toiling people can never live together as she is "a princess of yusin" steeped in pro-privileged concept to the marrow of her bones.
					
					 Park is asserting that the introduction of the above-said system is "badly needed to achieve an economic boom." But lurking behind it is her ulterior design to get rid of the economic crisis caused by her by sacrificing the workers.
					
					 It is a stark fact recognized by everyone that corrupt and ignorant Park has plunged the south Korean economy into a bottomless pitfall of crisis.
					
					 It is the mindset of the south Korean public that the system should be applied to Park first to punish her as she is being branded as the "one who registered no success" during her tenure of office in case the system comes in force.
					
					 All workers of south Korea should not step back even an inch in their death-defying struggle, the confrontation between justice and injustice, but overthrow the Park regime, the source of all evils, before anything else if they want to protect their rights to existence and work.
					
					 All workers in the DPRK will sincerely and positively support the just struggle of the south Korean workers who determinedly rose up against the Park regime's unpopular dictatorial rule in order to defend their genuine democratic rights and right to existence.

articles.title: Korean in U.S. Scorns U.S. Hysteric Fit
articles.content:
Korean in U.S. Scorns U.S. Hysteric Fit 
 Pyongyang, June 25 (KCNA) -- Ri Jun Mu, chairman of the East Regional Federation of Koreans in the U.S., made public an article titled "U.S. should not run riot in UN" on June 23.
					 When north Korea achieved success in the test-fire of surface-to-surface medium long-range strategic ballistic rocket Hwasong-10, the U.S. and its followers are kicking off hysteric fit again, the article said, and went on:
					
					 Whenever they took measures to slap sanctions on the north, they only pushed the latter into remarkably bolstering up its nukes and missile defence system.
					
					 If the U.S. sincerely wishes to see the Korean peninsula denuclearized, it should withdraw its troops and all types of WMDs including nuclear weapons from south Korea without delay.
					
					 And it should hold talks with the north as early as possible and show its sincerity by concluding a peace treaty.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un's Report to Seventh Congress of WPK Introduced by British Organization
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un's Report to Seventh Congress of WPK Introduced by British Organization 
 Pyongyang, June 25 (KCNA) -- "3. For the Independent Reunification of the Country" of supreme leader Kim Jong Un's Report to the Seventh Congress of the Workers' Party of Korea (WPK) on the Work of the Central Committee was posted by the British Preparatory Committee for the 2017 Meeting Praising Great Persons of Mt. Paektu on its website on June 17 on the occasions of the 52nd anniversary of leader Kim Jong Il's start of work at the C.C., WPK and the 16th anniversary of the publication of the June 15 North-South Joint Declaration.

articles.title: Lectures Given in Denmark, Mali, Niger
articles.content:
Lectures Given in Denmark, Mali, Niger
 Pyongyang, June 25 (KCNA) -- Lectures were given n Denmark, Mali and Niger from June 13 to 17 on the occasion of the 52nd anniversary of leader Kim Jong Il's start of work at the Central Committee of the Workers' Party of Korea (WPK).
					 The chairman of the Denmark-DPRK Friendship Association said:
					
					 HE Kim Jong Il worked heart and soul to develop the Juche idea founded by President Kim Il Sung, father of socialist Korea, in line with the requirement of the times and the developing revolution since he started his work at the Central Committee of the WPK.
					
					 He energetically worked for the improvement of the people's living standard, regarding it as his life-long motto to believe in the people as in Heaven.
					
					 He was, indeed, a great person who devoted his all to the prosperity of the country and happiness of the people.
					
					 A Malian personage praised Kim Jong Il for performing distinguished exploits for building the party during his protracted leadership over the WPK, adding:
					
					 He built the WPK into an ideological integral whole and the party which achieved the unity of actions and a genuine mother party which serves the people.
					
					 He made sure that the WPK paid great attention to providing the people with a well-off and highly civilized life.

articles.title: Anniversary of Kim Jong Il's Start of Work at C.C, WPK Marked in Different Countries
articles.content:
Anniversary of Kim Jong Il's Start of Work at C.C, WPK Marked in Different Countries
 Pyongyang, June 25 (KCNA) -- Round-table talks took place in Syria and Ethiopia and film shows in China, Algeria and Nigeria between June 15 and 20 to mark the 52nd anniversary of leader Kim Jong Il's start of work at the Central Committee of the Workers' Party of Korea (WPK).
					 Korean films "Flag of workers' Party of Korea" and "Monument to Party Founding" were shown.
					
					 The director of the Higher Education Department of the Regional Leadership of the Baath Arab Socialist Party of Syria said Kim Jong Il's start of work at the WPK Central Committee provided a sure guarantee for successfully carrying forward the Korean revolution down through generations.
					
					 He personified the idea and traits of President Kim Il Sung and developed the WPK into the party of the President, the director said, adding:
					
					 The ever-victorious history of the WPK would be unthinkable without the idea and leadership of HE Kim Jong Il.

articles.title: DPRK's Important Day Observed by Indonesian, Indian Newspapers
articles.content:
DPRK's Important Day Observed by Indonesian, Indian Newspapers
Pyongyang, June 25 (KCNA) -- Newspapers of Indonesia and India featured articles to observe the 52nd anniversary of leader Kim Jong Il's start of work at the Central Committee of the Workers' Party of Korea (WPK).
					 An article titled "Korean people leading an independent and creative life" illustrated with a photo of supreme leader Kim Jong Un was posted on an Indonesian on-line newspaper, which said:
					
					 The WPK is the world's only party that achieved a harmonious whole with the popular masses.
					
					 The harmonious whole of the Korean society that no party of any country can ever imitate and that can never be broken even with nuclear weapons is admired by the international community.
					
					 Kimilsungism-Kimjongilism, the guiding idea of the WPK, is a key to this great might.
					
					 The core of Kimilsungism-Kimjongilism is the Juche idea.
					
					 The WPK, guided by the Juche idea, has consistently pursued the politics of loving the popular masses and of reposing trust in them as required by the idea, and has made strenuous efforts to ceaselessly improve the people's living standard.
					
					 The Korean people came to lead an independent, creative and worthwhile life thanks to the guidance of the WPK and keenly experienced how precious their happiness is and how valuable the party that provided it is.
					
					 The WPK is being supported and trusted by the people as it is the party that serves them, being called by them the mother party. 
					
					 The Indian newspaper Indian and World Event on June 17 carried an article titled "Party of great Comrade Kim Il Sung and Comrade Kim Jong Il."

articles.title: Kim Jong Il Praised by Foreign Newspapers
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il Praised by Foreign Newspapers
 Pyongyang, June 25 (KCNA) -- Foreign newspapers featured articles from June 15 and 17 to mark the 52nd anniversary of leader Kim Jong Il's start of work at the Central Committee of the Workers' Party of Korea (WPK).
					 L'Avenir, the newspaper of DR Congo, devoted its one full page to an article titled "Workers' Party of Korea and Kim Jong Il" illustrated with his photo.
					
					 The article noted:
					
					 Comrade Kim Jong Il started his work at the Central Committee of the WPK on June 19, 1964.
					
					 This was a historic event of great significance in strengthening the WPK and accomplishing the cause of the Juche revolution.
					
					 He turned the DPRK into an ideologically pure entity and integral organization maintaining unity of actions that always emerges victorious, guided by the Juche idea and the Songun idea founded by President Kim Il Sung.
					
					 He firmly equipped all the party members with the Juche idea and the Songun idea and their embodiment the party policies and thus consolidated the might of the DPRK in every way.
					
					 The WPK has become a mother party which takes the destiny of the people in a responsible manner under his leadership.
					
					 He formulated the Songun politics as the basic political mode under socialism and turned the DPRK into a politico-ideological power and a military power.
					
					 The DPRK has turned into the nuclear weapons state and satellite manufacturer and launcher under his wise guidance.
					
					 The Myanmar newspaper The New Age carried an article titled "Kim Jong Il, undying party-building exploits."
					
					 The Syrian newspaper Al Baath in an article praised him for strengthening the WPK into the party of Kim Il Sung and invincible militant ranks.

articles.title: Kuwaiti Preparatory Committee for 2017 Meeting Praising Great Persons of Mt. Paektu Formed
articles.content:
Kuwaiti Preparatory Committee for 2017 Meeting Praising Great Persons of Mt. Paektu Formed
 Pyongyang, June 25 (KCNA) -- A Kuwaiti preparatory committee for the 2017 Meeting Praising Great Persons of Mt. Paektu was formed on June 16.
					 Javid Ahmad, director of the Administrative Department of the Times Publishing House who doubles as chairman of the Kuwait Asian Journalist Association, was elected chairman of the preparatory committee.
					
					 The preparatory committee decided to conduct positive activities of praising and adding luster to the exploits of President Kim Il Sung, leader Kim Jong Il and Marshal Kim Jong Un.

articles.title: Film Shows in Foreign Countries Observe Important Day of DPRK
articles.content:
Film Shows in Foreign Countries Observe Important Day of DPRK
 Pyongyang, June 25 (KCNA) -- Film shows held in Indonesia, Peru and Algeria from June 17 to 19 observed the 52nd anniversary of leader Kim Jong Il's start of work at the Central Committee of the Workers' Party of Korea.
					 Korean films "Grand Celebration of 70th Founding Anniversary of Workers' Party of Korea in Presence of Respected Comrade Kim Jong Un" and "Monument to Party Founding" were shown.

articles.title: U.S. Nuclear Sub's Entry into S. Korean Port Censured by Swiss Bodies
articles.content:
U.S. Nuclear Sub's Entry into S. Korean Port Censured by Swiss Bodies
 Pyongyang, June 25 (KCNA) -- We bitterly denounce the U.S. nuclear submarine Mississippi's entry into a south Korean port.
					 The Switzerland-Korea Committee and the Swiss Group for the Study of the Juche Idea said this in a joint statement on June 18.
					
					 The statement went on:
					
					 Two nuclear aircraft carriers of the U.S. are sailing in the waters of Asia-Pacific near the Korean peninsula. Against this backdrop, the U.S. nuclear submarine Mississippi has entered a south Korean port. This directly poses threat to the sovereignty and security of the DPRK.
					
					 For the DPRK to bolster nuclear deterrent for self-defence is the best option to cope with the constant nuclear threat from the U.S.
					
					 The line of simultaneously pushing forward the economic construction and the building of nuclear force being held fast to by the Workers' Party of Korea is the most just line for defending socialist Korea from the U.S. criminal and aggressive nuclear war moves.
					
					 The U.S. is insisting that the DPRK should dismantle its nukes first, while steadily increasing its nuclear arsenal. This is, indeed, sheer sophism and brigandish logic.
					
					 A "world without nuclear weapons" being advertised by the U.S. only provokes laughter of the world public in the light of its aggression policy hostile to the DPRK.
					
					 Peace on the Korean peninsula can be ensured only when the U.S. pulls its aggressor forces and nuclear weapons out of south Korea, stop nuclear war drills against the DPRK, conclude a peace treaty with it and refrain from disturbing independent reunification of Korea.

articles.title: Polish Body Accuses S. Korean Regime of Its Abduction of Citizens of DPRK
articles.content:
Polish Body Accuses S. Korean Regime of Its Abduction of Citizens of DPRK
 Pyongyang, June 25 (KCNA) -- The Polish Branch of the Korean Friendship Association released a statement on June 19 denouncing the south Korean regime's inhumane crime.
					 The statement said:
					
					 We protest against the south Korean regime for floating the fiction about the "voluntary defection from the north" by a group of citizens of the DPRK though it lured and abducted them to serve its politically motivated purpose. 
					
					 The DPRK is strongly demanding their repatriation but the south Korean authorities are paying no heed to its demand.
					
					 They can never evade its disgraceful responsibility for the group allurement and abduction.
					
					 We demand the south Korean authorities send back those citizens as early as possible to their families.
					
					 In the meantime, the branch sent letters to the south Korean puppet embassy in Warsaw and the UN high commissioner for Human Rights in demand of immediate repatriation of the DPRK citizens.

articles.title: Birth Anniversaries of Kim Il Sung, Kim Jong Il to Be Celebrated by Japanese Body
articles.content:
Birth Anniversaries of Kim Il Sung, Kim Jong Il to Be Celebrated by Japanese Body
 Pyongyang, June 25 (KCNA) -- A Japanese preparatory committee for celebrating the 105th birth anniversary of President Kim Il Sung and the 75th birth anniversary of leader Kim Jong Il was formed in Tokyo on June 14.
					 Fumihiro Himori, chairman of the Japan Committee for Supporting the Independent and Peaceful Reunification of Korea; Kenki Nakamura, chairman of the Japan-Korea Society for Scientific and Educational Interchange;  Shingo Kanemaru, advisor to the Tokyo-Pyongyang Rainbow Bridge; Dewi Sukarno, honorary chairperson of the Society for Disseminating and Supporting Kimilsungia-Kimjongilia; Tokuji Yanagisawa, deputy chief director of the Japan-Korea Cultural Interchange Association; and Kiichi Tsunoda, co-representative of the Gunma Prefectural People's Council for Japan-Korea Friendship and Solidarity; were elected co-chairpersons of the preparatory committee.
					
					 The preparatory committee decided to take part in the activities of the International Preparatory Committee for the 2017 Meeting Praising Great Persons of Mt. Paektu and organize colorful political and cultural events including a meeting for friendship between Japan and the DPRK.

articles.title: Representacion permanente de RPDC ante ONU envia aviso a Departamento de Estado de EE.UU.
articles.content:
Representacion permanente de RPDC ante ONU envia aviso a Departamento de Estado de EE.UU.
Pyongyang, 25 de junio (ACNC) -- Recientemente, la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea realizo con exito el lanzamiento de prueba de Hwasong-10, cohete balistico estrategico tierra-tierra de mediano y largo alcance.
					Al respecto, el Departamento de Estado norteamericano informo el dia 23 a la RPDC su posicion de cuestionar el lanzamiento senalando que esto es "violacion" flagrante de las resoluciones del Consejo de Seguridad de la ONU, agrava la tension de la Peninsula Coreana e inestabiliza mas la region, por lo cual la RPDC debe dejarse mas de actos provocativos y amenazantes. 
					
					Detras de ello, hay siniestro intento de EE.UU. de encubrir su naturaleza de criminal, que agrava al extremo la situacion de la Peninsula Coreana realizando frecuentes ejercicios de guerra y aumentando sus fuerzas armadas en la Peninsula Coreana y su contorno, imputar la responsabilidad a la RPDC y fomentar el ambiente de presion internacional sobre ella. 
					
					Por eso, la representacion permanente de la RPDC ante la ONU envio el dia 24 al Departamento de Estado norteamericano un aviso de respuesta para ratificar la posicion de principios de la RPDC. 
					
					La nota expone la posicion de que son una violacion a la Carta de la ONU y las leyes internacionales las mismas "resoluciones" del Consejo de Seguridad de la ONU que "prohiben" el lanzamiento de cohetes por la RPDC.
					
					Prosigue que no pueden ser ninguna provocacion las justas medidas de autodefensa de la RPDC como las tomadas sucesivamente para fortalecer el disuasivo nuclear frente a la abierta amenaza nuclear que ejerce EE.UU. introduciendo de continuo sus propiedades estrategicas en la Peninsula Coreana y sus alrededores.
					
					Destaca que la RPDC mantiene la posicion de que ella tambien debe tener potentes medios de ataque con que puede amenazar constantemente a EE.UU. para garantizar la seguridad de la patria y el pueblo desde las persistentes amenazas nucleares del segundo.
					
					Quedo ratificada la posicion de principios de la RPDC de que frente a los "cotidianos" actos hostiles de EE.UU., se tornaron tambien cotidianos los trabajos de la primera para implementar su linea de desarrollo paralelo de caracter autodefensivo y manteniendola constantemente mientras continuen la politica hostil y la amenaza nuclear de EE.UU., la RPDC tomara una tras otra las medidas para fortalecer el disuasivo nuclear para la autodefensa.

articles.title: EE.UU y titeres surcoreanos no se liberaran de responsabilidad criminal, senala DP de CDN
articles.content:
EE.UU y titeres surcoreanos no se liberaran de responsabilidad criminal, senala DP de CDN
Pyongyang, 25 de junio (ACNC) -- El Departamento de Politica del Comite de Defensa Nacional de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea hizo publica el dia 25 una informacion detallada que revela y condena los crimenes de los enemigos jurados en vista de la situacion actual creada en la candente zona maritima del Mar Oeste, maqueta de la politica hostil de Estados Unidos y la politica conflictiva de los titeres surcoreanos contra la RPDC. 
					La nota puso al desnudo la naturaleza bandidesca de EE.UU. que convirtio el Mar Oeste de Corea en la zona maritima mas candente, y prosiguio:
					
					La tension militar de esa zona, que no se alivia aunque transcurran los dias, es la continuacion de la politica hostil anti-RPDC de EE.UU. y su producto directo. 
					
					Inmediatamente despues del cese del fuego de la pasada guerra coreana, el imperio hizo desesperadas maniobras para preparar un punto de incendio por la provocacion de nueva guerra.
					
					En muchas ocasiones inclusive la 346a reunion de la Comision de Armisticio Militar sostenida en diciembre de 1973 y las conversaciones militares a nivel de general RPDC-EE.UU. en Phanmunjom realizadas en agosto y septiembre de 1999, EE.UU. dio espalda a los esfuerzos de la parte coreana para establecer la linea de demarcacion militar maritima y prevenir el choque militar en el Mar Oeste de Corea. 
					
					EE.UU. esta sin excepcion detras de las perversas maquinaciones de los titeres surcoreanos tendentes a ampliar la agravacion de tension militar de la candente zona maritima hasta la desembocadura del rio Han.
					
					Despues de inventada la "linea del limite al Norte" en el Mar Oeste de Corea se perpetraron en esta zona maritima aguda los entrenamientos de disparo de proyectiles y las incesantes infiltraciones a aguas y el espacio aereo jurisdiccionales de la RPDC, lo cual revela claramente que Estados Unidos es el autor principal que promueve la tension militar y el peligro conflictivo en esa zona maritima.
					
					Tambien, la informacion puso al desnudo las maquinaciones de los compinches titeres surcoreanos que convirtieron el mar comun de la nacion en la candente zona maritima de confrontacion y conflicto.
					
					La comandancia de defensa de las islas de noroeste del ejercito titere surcoreano que toma esa zona como su teatro operacional escenifico una actividad para "recordar" a quienes perdieron la vida al cabo de actuar en la primera linea de confrontacion fratricida. Y realizo otra payasada provocativa vociferando la "represalia", ocasion en la cual se efectuo al mismo tiempo el ejercicio de disposicion para las fuerzas armadas de movimiento rapido de las unidades maritimas e infanterias del Sur de Corea fijadas oficialmente en mayo destruyeran dentro de 24 horas la "provocacion del Norte".
					
					Desde el dia 16 hasta el 18, los titeres surcoreanos libraron el ejercicio de movimiento maritimo movilizando decenas de buques de la marina y la policia maritima y los aviones de varios tipos desarrollando los ejercicios de disparo de fusiles y canones. Tambien, se entregaron a la confrontacion militar cacareando que convertiran en la "tumba" de alguien la zona maritima tensa del Mar Oeste bajo la cobertura del ejercicio de defensa antiaerea y de defensa de la zona de acantonamiento y el ejercicio contra la penetracion submarina.
					
					Realmente, la situacion militar de la zona candente del Mar Oeste se llega a la etapa mas incontrolable.
					
					Lo comprueban realmente las imprudentes locuras militares cometidas el 27 de mayo por los gangsteres militares surcoreanos.
					
					En la provocativa agresion maritima se introducen sin excepcion los colectivos maritimos completamente armados compuestos con los buques militares surcoreanos y los asisten las fuerzas aereas y la artilleria terrestre de los titeres surcoreanos.
					
					Los titeres surcoreanos tienen el intento maligno de conducir la contramedida autodefensiva del Ejercito Popular de Corea perpetrando intencionalmente la agresion y el disparo desacertado, tildarnos del autor de la "provocacion y amenaza" movilizando las publicaciones venales reaccionarias y llevar la situacion de la region al borde de la guerra. 
					
					La tarea mas apremiante en el aseguramiento de la paz y la seguridad de la Peninsula Coreana es calmar primeramente la situacion candente de las aguas del Mar Oeste, senala el documento y continua:
					
					Hay que aliviar la tension militar que se agrava mas y eliminar cuanto antes el peligro de choque militar.
					
					Actualmente, la traidora Park Geun-hye y su banda, caidos en crisis peor de la "administracion estatal", llevan al borde de la explosion la situacion aguda de la zona maritima del Mar Oeste bajo la activa instigacion de su amo gringo.
					
					La situacion de esta zona candente del Mar Oeste hace sentir profundamente el hecho de que la paz no puede lograrse jamas con las palabras y la paz verdadera se garantiza por las fuerzas armadas invencibles.
					
					Es invariable la voluntad de nuestro ejercito y el pueblo para mejorar las relaciones intercoreanas y relajar la situacion de la Peninsula Coreana previniendo el peligro de choque en esta zona maritima.
					
					EE.UU. y los titeres surcoreanos deben reconocer su responsabilidad criminal que convirtieron la zona maritima del sudoeste en la zona mas candente del mundo y cesar de inmediato sus imprudentes provocaciones militares.

articles.title: ACRC demanda a banda surcoreana devolver a norcoreanas tentadas y raptadas
articles.content:
ACRC demanda a banda surcoreana devolver a norcoreanas tentadas y raptadas 
Pyongyang, 25 de junio (ACNC) -- El dia 21, la banda titere surcoreana nego la demanda de la asistencia de las ciudadanas norcoreanas seducidas y secuestradas pedida al tribunal por la Union de Abogados por una Sociedad Democratica del Sur de Corea (UASD) y rompio por fin el juicio al hacer comparecer al interino legal, su esbirro, de manera que se revelo al pie de la letra la figura del colectivo anti-etico y estafador sin par.
					  Al respecto, el portavoz del Comite Central de la Asociacion de la Cruz Roja de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea publico el dia 25 una declaracion como sigue:
					
					Esto demuestra que la banda titere queda muy perpleja preocupandose por el posible descubrimiento de los verdaderos aspectos de sus crimenes y ella misma reconoce su atroz acto de tentacion y rapto.
					
					La banda titere surcoreana no puede tener una razon ni pretexto para negar la demanda de la UASD por encargo de los familiares de las victimas.
					
					Son precisamente los agentes del Servicio de Inteligencia del Sur de Corea los que traman la estratagema intrigante de toda indole por destruir nuestras familias armoniosas recurriendo a la seduccion y el secuestro a nuestras ciudadanas con el fin de mantener la atroz politica conflictiva anti-RPDC  que esta a punto de bancarrota, y las victimas directas de tal crimen devienen precisamente nuestras ciudadanas tentadas y raptadas y sus familiares.
					
					Tambien en este momento, los familiares de las victimas desean que sus hijas amantes regresen cuanto antes a la patria y estamos dispuestos a enviarlos al Sur de Corea para reunirse con sus hijas.
					
					Ahora, la horda titere disparatean sobre la "adaptacion" y la "educacion", lo cual no pasa de ser la artimana por encubrir su  naturaleza vil y evitar la protesta y censura del interior y exterior del pais.
					
					Francamente dicho, ya conocimos como la palma de la mano por que la banda titere no publica los problemas personales de nuestras ciudadanas y en que rigurosa situacion y a que chantaje y tretas de conciliacion se enfrentan ellas.
					
					No desconocimos que los agentes del SI estan angustiados como resolverian el problema de nuestras ciudadanas secuestradas.
					
					Cuanto mas diga las mentiras para ocultar la verdad, tanto mas sera embustero y se agrandaran sus crimenes en medio de la censura de las personas.
					
					  Volvimos a advertir a la banda titere que se empeorara mas la situacion si sigue hiriendo a los familiares de las victimas y burlando la opinion publica del interior y exterior del pais recurriendo persistentemente a las perversas maniobras intrigantes contra nuestras ciudadanas.

articles.title: Establecido en RPDC Dia de Fuerzas Estrategicas
articles.content:
Establecido en RPDC Dia de Fuerzas Estrategicas
Pyongyang, 25 de junio (ACNC) -- Quedo publicado el dia 24 un decreto del Presidium de la Asamblea Popular Suprema de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea sobre el establecimiento del Dia de las Fuerzas Estrategicas de la RPDC.
					El decreto senala como sigue:
					
					Las fuerzas estrategicas del heroico Ejercito Popular de Corea son las fidedignas fuerzas armadas nucleares del Partido del Trabajo de Corea que garantizan confiablemente el futuro de eterna duracion de la patria y la nacion frustrando la cada dia mas recrudescente demencia por la provocacion de la guerra nuclear de los imperialistas norteamericanos y las fuerzas enemigas.
					
					El Dirigente Kim Jong Il, quien heredo y desarrollo de modo brillante la idea del Presidente Kim Il Sung de construir las autoctonas fuerzas de cohete, fundo el 3 de julio de 1999 las fuerzas de cohete estrategico, tipo de ejercito independiente, asentando asi la firme base para consolidar el disuasivo nuclear autodefensivo.
					
					En acato al noble proposito de los grandes Lideres, el Mariscal Kim Jong Un ilumino los propios metodos de golpe con fuegos de las fuerzas estrategicas del EPC conforme a la situacion creada y la demanda de la guerra moderna y las fortalecio y desarrollo con la incansable direccion como un tipo de ejercito poderoso, dispuesto de los medios de golpe nuclear minimizados y de precision.
					
					Gracias a la guia de los grandes Hombres del monte Paektu, las fuerzas estrategicas se fortalecieron como el ejercito poderoso en la ideologia y la conviccion que tiene establecido el firme sistema de la direccion unica del partido sobre el ejercito y como una invencible fila de combate capaz de exterminar de un tiron los nidos de la agresion en todas las partes del globo terraqueo.
					
					A fin de conmemorar el 3 de julio de 1999 en que el Dirigente organizo las fuerzas estrategicas del EPC, decide fijar ese dia como el Dia de Fuerzas Estrategicas de la RPDC, aclara el decreto.

articles.title: Funcionarios coreanos departen con embajador noruego
articles.content:
Funcionarios coreanos departen con embajador noruego
Pyongyang, 25 de junio (ACNC) -- Jan Ole Grevstad, quien entrego a Kim Yong Nam, presidente del Presidium de la Asamblea Popular Suprema de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea, sus cartas credenciales que le acreditan como nuevo embajador extraordinario y plenipotenciario del Reino de Noruega en la RPDC, se reunio del dia 20 al 24 con un viceministro y el embajador encargado de DDHH. de la cancilleria coreana, y otros funcionarios concernientes.
					Ambas partes discutieron el asunto de desarrollar las relaciones bilaterales de acuerdo con los intereses comunes de los pueblos de ambos paises e intercambiaron sinceramente sus criterios sobre la situacion actual de la Peninsula Coreana.
					
					La parte coreana se refirio a que la causa raigal de la empeorada situacion de la Peninsula Coreana reside en la politica hostil y las amenazas nucleares de Estados Unidos contra la RPDC. Y destaco que el alivio de la tension y la preservacion de la seguridad de la Peninsula Coreana no se lograran solamente con el esfuerzo unilateral de la RPDC. Recalco que los imprudentes actos del imperio que sigue introduciendo sus bienes estrategicos en la Peninsula Coreana y su contorno obligan a la RPDC a tomar mas fuertes y nuevas medidas para fortalecer mas en lo cualitativo y cuantitativo el disuasivo nuclear. 
					
					Prosiguio que el imperio experimentara que fue indiscreta y muy erronea desde el punto de vista estrategica su medida de haber introducido otra vez en la Peninsula Coreana sus bienes estrategicos incluyendo el submarino nuclear Mississippi. 
					
					La parte noruega deseo que se alivie la desconfianza entre la RPDC y EE.UU. y se resuelva el problema nuclear.

articles.title: Tiene lugar mitin multitudinario por dia de lucha antiyanqui-25 de junio
articles.content:
Tiene lugar mitin multitudinario por dia de lucha antiyanqui-25 de junio
Pyongyang, 25 de junio (ACNC) -- Tuvo lugar hoy en la Plaza Kim Il Sung el mitin de los pyongyaneses por el dia de la lucha antiyanqui-25 de junio.
					Tomaron parte en la ocasion Pak Pong Ju, Choe Ryong Hae, Kim Ki Nam y otros cuadros directivos del partido y el Estado, el presidente del partido amigo, los funcionarios de las entidades de masas, los ministerios y organos centrales, los cuadros, trabajadores, jovenes y estudiantes de las fabricas, empresas, granjas cooperativas y universidades de esta capital, los compatriotas ultramarinos y el representante del Frente Democratico Nacional Antiimperialista en Pyongyang.
					
					Fueron invitados los representantes diplomaticos, los miembros de las embajadas y del Cuerpo de Agregados Militares, en Corea, y los huespedes extranjeros.
					
					En su discurso pronunciado, Cha Hui Rim, presidente del Comite Popular de la Ciudad de Pyongyang, recordo que pasaron mas de 60 anos desde el cese de fuego de la guerra, y prosiguio:
					
					En vez de sacar las lecciones merecidas de su vergonzosa derrota sufrida en la pasada guerra coreana, EE.UU. sigue ocupando ilegalmente el suelo surcoreano y perpetra incesantemente las maquinaciones represivas contra la RPDC.
					
					Este ano, los imperialistas yanquis cometieron los barbaros actos hostiles de inventar la inaudita "resolucion de sancion" de la ONU cuestionando perversamente el fortalecimiento del disuasivo nuclear que es la opcion autodefensiva de la RPDC, y su justo y legitimo lanzamiento de satelite artificial de la tierra. Ademas, se dedicaron a las maniobras para provocar la guerra nuclear introduciendo enormes fuerzas armadas y equipos belicos.
					
					Para colmo, cometieron actos provocativos de categoria especial de examinar la posibilidad real de la "operacion de descabezamiento" para eliminar la Direccion Suprema de la Revolucion Coreana y lograr el "derrumbe del regimen" de la RPDC.
					
					Tales tentativas provocativas de los yanquis y titeres surcoreanos, que actuan con imprudencia nadando contra la realidad cambiada y la corriente de la epoca y levantando la oleada fanatica de confrontacion anti-RPDC, hacen redoblar mas la voluntad de venganza del ejercito y pueblo coreanos.
					
					Si los imperialistas yanquis y la banda traidora surcoreana atentan, por poco que sea, la dignidad y la soberania de la RPDC pese a las reiteradas advertencias de esta, el ejercito y el pueblo de Corea eliminaran totalmente el bastion de los enemigos y lograran sin falta la causa historica de la reunificacion de la patria.
					
					Los delegados de los obreros, trabajadores agricolas y estudiantes jovenes expresaron en sus pronunciaciones la decision de heredar la gran tradicion victoriosa y dar la mas tragica derrota final a los enemigos al destruir con las fuerzas armadas invencibles de Paektusan el baluarte de agresion sin dejar ni un tipejo de sellar el acta de capitulacion.
					
					Acto seguido, hubo la manifestacion multitudinaria.
					
					El mismo dia, tuvieron lugar mitines semejantes en todas las provincias, ciudades y distritos de la RPDC.
